DBClusterIdentifier.description: A DB cluster identifier to force a failover for. This parameter is not case-sensitive. Constraints:   Must contain from 1 to 63 alphanumeric characters or hyphens   First character must be a letter   Cannot end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens

TargetDBInstanceIdentifier.description: The name of the instance to promote to the primary instance. You must specify the instance identifier for an Aurora Replica in the DB cluster. For example, mydbcluster-replica1.
